Neliti | Full-stack developer | Jakarta | FULL-TIME | REMOTE

We are a small team working to change the way academic research is published and make scientific work free of paywalls. We run neliti.com, Indonesia's largest repository of academic research (~3m users/mo), and are beginning to sell software to universities to manage their journals. This is a great opportunity to get in on ground floor with a successful startup, with a lot of freedom and opportunity for personal growth.

We're looking for talented full-stack developers to join our team who like well-defined tasks and a lot of freedom. Our backend is Django, frontend Vue.js, so experience in these is a bonus. Remote or Jakarta.

More info: https://www.neliti.com/careers

Contact: andrew@neliti.com
